name: rgb-generater
description: This package provides a simple function to generate a random RGB color. The generated color is represented as a string in the format "rgb(R, G, B)", where R, G, and B are random values for the red, green, and blue components, respectively.This package is a lightweight utility for projects that require random colors, such as in UI design, data visualization, or any context where a diverse set of colors is needed. Users can easily integrate it by installing the package and using the exported getRandomColor function.
author: M.Umair Shoukat
